answers.answer_content: It sounds thin, but you're 5'1 so that's not bad.. You're measurements sound pretty good too, so I wouldn't worry about it.

Here's a better question for all the girls who ask that when they're obviously skinny. Do you have a mirror?

I'm 5"11 and I'm 165 pounds, but its all muscle and height.. Just look in a mirror. Really.
Yep I'd say so! I'm 5'2" and I weight about 110 and I'm considered skinny! I look it too! You probably do as well!
Yes I wish I was like you :/
No, not really.. Im 5'2 and 107. Im a guy, so idk. If it is, were skinny together!
